components/category/shop-by-price:
{{#and theme_settings.shop_by_price_visibility shop_by_price}}
{{> components/faceted-search/faceted-search-navigation facet='price' title='Price'}}
    {{#each shop_by_price}}
  • {{lang 'category.filter_price_range'}} {{low.formatted}} - {{high.formatted}} {{lang 'category.filter_select_announcement'}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/and}}
components/category/sidebar:
<nav>
    {{#if category.faceted_search_enabled}}
        {{> components/faceted-search/index category}}
        <!-- {{> components/category/shop-by-price shop_by_price=category.shop_by_price category_url=category.url}} -->
    {{/if}}
</nav>
components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc:
{{#each this}}
  • {{{sanitize title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} {{#if count}} ({{count}}) {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if children}} {{> components/faceted-search/facets/hierarchy-children children}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/range: {{> components/faceted-search/faceted-search-navigation}}
components/faceted-search/index:
{{> components/faceted-search/selected-facets selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.filter'}} {{#any facets visible=true}}
{{#each facets}} {{#if visible}} {{{dynamicComponent 'components/faceted-search/facets'}}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{/any}}
components/faceted-search/selected-facet:
{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.title'}}

{{#if items}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{#if facet '===' 'rating'}} {{> components/products/ratings rating=title}} {{else}} {{{sanitize title}}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{else}}

{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.no-filters'}}

{{/if}}
components/products/ratings: {{#for 1 5}} {{#if ../this.rating '>=' $index}} {{else}} {{/if}} {{/for}}
